casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Guy Tobias LEGRANDE 327P02-10 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Guy Tobias LeGrande, for LeGrande, Guy Tobias. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, T. Lynn Clodfelter, District Attorney, for State of N.C. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of June 2018 by Defendant for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018." Ervin, J. recused
